pkgmetadata.longdescription: Regression Analysis and Forecasting Using Textual Data from a Time-Varying Dictionary // Provides functionalities based on the paper "Time Varying Dictionary and the Predictive Power of FED Minutes" (Lima, 2018) doi:10.2139/ssrn.3312483. It selects the most predictive terms, that we call time-varying dictionary using supervised machine learning techniques as lasso and elastic net.
